meanings.sent1: Her constant perversities made it difficult to understand her true intentions.

meanings.sent3: Despite his perversities, he always managed to bring a smile to people's faces.
meanings.sent4: The perversities of the situation were beyond belief.
meanings.sent5: The perversities of the puzzle challenged even the most skilled players.
